question:
[Kerrie] went to dinner with her daughter [Joy]. They then went to the park afterwards. [Melissa] went to the store with her sister [Morgan] [Cyrus] and his sister, [Kerrie] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Valerie] went to the store with her sister [Melissa] [Valerie] was mad at her son, [Darryl]. She found he'd been stealing from her purse. [Darryl]'s aunt, [Morgan], took him to the zoo. [Debra] called her son, [Brian], from upstairs so that he could eat lunch. [Brian] got his sister, [Morgan], so she could eat lunch as well. [Cyrus] and his brother, [Victor] run a turtle farm. [Joy], who is the sister of [Morgan], is a lovely girl.
Question: How is [Victor] related to [Debra]?
